infos.value: Ah... I sure am hungry...
You would speak about your stomach at a time like this!?
So scared you just wanna turn tail and scamper back to the castle, huh?
Well, yes. I-I'd like to return. No enemies at the castle, and food aplenty.
Don't you wanna go back too, Learte?
Don't group me together with you. I'd like to get a reward for proving myself in battle!
Reward? Didn't you say you only wanted honor?
Did I?
Also remember you saying you wanted to be led by Sterne in «Fortem» rather than being in «Caelum».
H-hold your tongue! Someone might hear you...
True, though, isn't it? You'd get a closer view of Sterne, after all...
I-I want nothing of the sort! I think I finally realized...
Oh, then is Lord Mont the new object of your affection instead of Lord Sterne?
You flap-mouthed fool!
You truly are dense...
Hmm?
You intend to serve your whole life?
You saying...the life of a soldier isn't for you?
Well, I could save up enough money to buy myself a peaceful place somewhere and just retire.
Oh! I never thought of that.
What about you? You don't have any concerns about the future?
Hmm. Whatever will be, will be, I say.
Ugh... How could I fall for this big oaf, of all people...?
Hm? Did you say something?
Nothing at all! On your feet! The enemy approaches!
